00023 class csys(dict):
00024     """2D coordonate system data structure:
00025 
00026 Parameters:
00027     * label: it is the structure associated name
00028     * parent: the parent coordinate system (all systems have at least global as parent)
00029     * origin: a tuple containing the origin (with respect to the parent if it exists - if not to the global)
00030     * rotation: a float representing the angle of the Ox axis (with respect to the parent if it exists - if not to the global)
00031     """
00032     def __init__(self, 
00033                  origin, 
00034                  parent=None, 
00035                  rotation=None, 
00036                  label="global", 
00037                  type_="cartesian"):
00038     
00039         self["origin"]   = origin
00040         self["parent"]   = parent       
00041         self["rotation"] = rotation
00042         self["type"]     = type_
00043         self["label"]    = label
00044 
00045     def isglobal(self):
00046         return self["label"] == "global"
00047 
00048 class point(dict):
00049     """2D point data structure:
00050 
00051 Parameters:
00052     * label: it is the structure associated name
00053     * parent: the parent point (if the point is obtained through a geometrical transformation)
00054     * transformation: the geometrical transformation object (if the point was obtained through one - not implemented)
00055     * coords: the coordinates of the point with respect to the coordinate system
00056     * csys: the coordinate system in which xy values are defined (if csys == None then it is considerate to be global)
00057     """
00058     def __init__(self, 
00059                  coords, 
00060                  parent = None, 
00061                  csys=None, 
00062                  transformation=None, 
00063                  label=None):
00064     
00065         self["coords"]         = coords
00066         self["parent"]         = parent 
00067         self["csys"]           = csys
00068         self["transformation"] = transformation
00069         self["label"]          = label
00070 
00071 # These are to be done
00072 class segment():
00073     """2D segment data structure:
00074 
00075 Parameters:
00076     * label: it is the structure associated name
00077     * parent: the parent line (if the line is obtained through a geometrical transformation)
00078     * transformation: the geometrical transformation object (if the segment was obtained through one - not implemented)
00079     * coords: the coordinates of the point with respect to the coordinate system
00080     * point1 & point2: the points defining the line in the 2D plane
00081     """
00082     def __init__(self, coords, parent=None, transformation=None, label=None, point1=None, point2=None):
00083         self.coords=coords
00084         self.parent=parent      
00085         self.transformation=transformation
00086         self.label=label
00087 
00088     def __len__(self):
00089         return "not implemented yet!"

00100 class geometry(dict):
00101     """Holder for the geometry internal representation and associated methods"""
00102     def __init__(self, csys=None, transformations=None, points=None, lines=None, surfaces=None): 
00103         dict.__init__(self)
00104     
00105         self["csys"]            = csys # list or dict ????
00106         self["transformations"] = transformations
00107         self["points"]          = points
00108         self["lines"]           = lines
00109         self["surfaces"]        = surfaces
00110         
00111         self.tree = {}
00112         
00113         self.__populateTree()
00114         
00115     def addCsys(self, coordSys):
00116         self.csys.append(coordSys)
00117     
00118     def __populateTree(self):
00119         """populates tree, based on relations described between geometrical entities"""
00120         pass
